original: 扶風茂陵人，東漢經學大家馬融之女、馬倫之妹。《列女傳》記載其有才義。少喪親長而追感，乃作《申情賦》。
text: A native of Fufeng Maoling, the daughter of Ma Rong and the sister of Ma Lun, a great scholar of Eastern Han Confucianism. "Biography of Women" records his talent and righteousness. Less bereavement and long-term pursuit, this is the "Shen Qing Fu".
